description_for_human: Provides ethical compliance analysis (Halal/Haram) for financial assets based on historical Islamic jurisprudence.
description_for_model: Use this plugin to determine the Shariah compliance status of financial topics (e.g., Bitcoin, Gold, Riba). The API returns a 'status' which maps to 'Green' (Permissible), 'Yellow' (Disputed), or 'Red' (Prohibited). It also provides semantic JSON-LD attributes where 'http://schema.org/Approved' means Halal and 'http://schema.org/Rejected' means Haram. Always respect the 'X-Disclaimer' header.
